title: ‘Dancin’’ Revival to Boogie Onto Broadway in March
description: The show, originally created by Bob Fosse in the late 1970s, has been reimagined with the blessing of his daughter.
dc:creator: Michael Paulson
media:credit: Gabriella Angotti-Jones for The New York Times
media:description: Ensemble members in “Bob Fosse’s Dancin’” during the show’s run at the Old Globe in San Diego this spring.
